content: So there are a few errors in the IG that I'm not sure what to do with. One is that the ImplementationGuide requires at least one Resource now in R4, but I don't have any resources in this IG. The others say I need a <!--status-bar--> tag, but I'm not sure where to put that?
Why is FHIRPath being implemented as an ImplementationGuide? I thought it wasn't FHIR-specific.
Yes, but the ImplementationGuide can't point to itself...
<!--status-bar--> tag is where the little yellow publish box should go... right after the menu bar. if you use _layouts can stick it in there.

Yes, but the ImplementationGuide can't point to itself...

i realized that after typing it
Both FHIRPath and CQL use the publisher, but they’re not “Implementation Guides”
Let's put the G4 file in the IG as a binary
Okay, FHIRPath builds with 0 errors, 0 warnings, still 1 broken link related to the binary resource that I'm not sure where it's coming from or how to fix.
